title: Please help ID this font...
content:
Please help me to identify this font - the automated online applications came close but couldn't get it 100% accurately. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Legacy Language Solutions Logo1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200201/http:/typophile.com/files/Legacy%20Language%20Solutions%20Logo1.png) | 10.76 KB |
author: Abatjour3407

comments.content:
The best place for a font identification is  
 [http://www.typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200201/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid "http://www.typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.

Edit: already solved  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/122770](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200201/http:/www.typophile.com/node/122770 "http://www.typophile.com/node/122770")
